social_posts.post_text: Tips for the Culebra ferry - take blankets and warm clothes, it’s like the arctic inside ❄️ You will probably feel nauseous!🤢. Make sure to keep checking for tickets online because they sell out. Long day…had to take the 3.30am ferry and wait for sunrise but made it to Flamenco Beach. #culebra #puertorico
Flamenco Beach - voted one of the top 10 beaches in the world. #puertorico #culebra #flamencobeach

As soon as I saw photos of the restaurant at this hotel I knew I had to stay here. Bar delle Terme at the Albergo Terminus hotel in Como was one of the prettiest restaurants I’ve dined at. Ended up eating here three times lol. Loved the pretty Christmas decorations, velvet chairs and cozy vibes. 

If you’re planning a winter trip to Lake Como definitely put this @lariohotels restaurant on your list.

Featured: octopus carpaccio, carbonara, paper plane cocktail. 

📍Como, Italy 🇮🇹 

#lakecomo #comoitaly #carbonara #pastacarbonara #octopuscarpaccio #albergoterminus #bardelleterme #comorestaurant #travel #travelblogger #travelfoodie #travelfood #instatravel #comolago #italytravel #italytrip #prettyrestaurant #finedining #lariohotels

People often describe Milan as “grey”. The day I visited Milan was especially grey and rainy, but the Christmas lights and decorations made the city so colorful. 

I live in New York which is known for its Christmas spirit, but Milan is also beautifully decked out at this time of year. 

#yesmilano #milan #milanitaly #italy #italytravel #italytrip #milanchristmas #christmasinmilan #milanatchristmas #instatravel #travelblogger

Bellagio in Italy is a dream ✨🇮🇹 Here’s how to spend a few hours in Bellagio: 

⛴️ Take the ferry there from Como. The journey takes around 1 hour 
👟Stroll around the pretty streets of the town
📸 Walk up the stairs and take a photo from the top of Sarlita Serbelloni 
🍷 Do a wine tasting at Aperitivo Et Al
⛪️ Visit Place de l’eglise and the Basilica of St. Giacomo
🏞️Check out the viewpoints, Punta Spartivento and Punto Panoramico
🌳 Walk through the gardens of Villa Melzi
🍴Have lunch in any of the lakeside restaurants
🏖️ Relax and swim at Lido di Bellagio 

#bellagioitaly #bellagiocomo #lakecomo #comolago #italytravel #italytraveltips #thingstodoinbellagio #italytrip 
 

📍Bellagio, Lake Como

Spent a day bar hopping in Milan. The bars here have serious vibes ✨. The city has lots of beautiful hotel bars for cocktails and the best time to grab a drink is during Aperitivo (around 6pm) when you’ll get free snacks with your drink. Every time I stop in Milan I have to have an Aperol at @terrazzaaperol too which has beautiful views of the Duomo. 

Bars featured:
📍The Bulgari Bar @bulgarihotels 
📍Mandarin Garden @mo_milan 
📍@terrazzaaperol
📍@dolcegabbana_martini
📍@camparinoingalleria
📍@magcafe 

#milanitaly #milan #milano #milanbars #cocktailbars #hotelbars #italytrip #italytravel #italytraveltips

Decided to stay in Lake Como an extra night and got to enjoy the heated infinity pool @hiltonlakecomo. Such a beautiful hotel overlooking the lake ✨

#lakecomo #lakecomoitaly #comoitaly #italytravel #italyhotel #aesthetichotel #hotel #luxuryhotel

The pool @twahotel is open year-round and has epic views of the runway at JFK! It’s heated up to 95 degrees in winter and there’s even a heated Runway Chalet that serves festive drinks and food. 

During summer/fall you may need a reservation and have to pay a cover charge. In winter/spring no reservations are required and only non-hotel guests pay a cover charge. 

If you’re a hotel guest there are specific free swim hours where you can enjoy the pool without reservation. If you want to swim outside of those hours you can add a pool reservation during the online booking process. Non-hotel guests can make reservations for the pool via ResortPass. Each reservation lasts for 1 hour 45 mins.

#airporthotel #twahotel #infinitypool #jfkairport #jfkterminal4 #hotelpool #runway #airportrunway

If you have a few hours to kill at JFK or you need to stay overnight to catch an early flight, the @twahotel is worth a visit. This retro hotel will transport you back in time to the 1960s and the golden age of flying! 

The TWA hotel is housed inside the former Trans World Airlines terminal at JFK, which was designed by iconic designer Eero Saarinen. Trans World Airlines was popular in the 1960s but fell into decline in the 1990s and was eventually acquired by American Airlines. The terminal was shut down and left empty for years.

It’s now one of the coolest airport hotels in the world! You don’t have to be a guest of the hotel to experience it either - have a wander around and get lunch in the restaurant if you have time before your flight. 

Highlights of the hotel: 
🏊 Heated outdoor infinity pool with runway views 
✈️ Lockheed Constellation aircraft called “Connie” which has been transformed into a cocktail lounge
🍴 The Paris Cafe restaurant and Sunken Lounge 
🍔 Food Hall with grab and go food
📸 Photo room with photo booth 
🏋️ 10,000 square foot fitness center 
🛌 512 guest rooms with views of JFK’s runways 
🧥Museum exhibits including flight attendant uniforms through the years 

#twahotel #jfkterminal5 #terminal5 #jfkairport #airporthotel #aesthetichotel #coolhotel #uniquehotel #hotels #hotelstay #avgeek

Booked a last minute trip to Lake Como and new I had to stay at this hotel. Right by the train station in Como and it turned out to have the most beautiful Christmas decorations and decor. Super cozy hotel that made my experience in Como that bit more magical ✨ Albergo Terminus @lariohotels 

📍Lake Como, Italy
